data.lyric:
[ti:One Of Them Girls]
[ar:Lee Brice]
[al:One Of Them Girls]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Of Them Girls - Lee Brice
[00:07.14]Lyrics by：Ashley Gorley/Ben Johnson/Dallas Davidson/Lee Brice
[00:14.28]Are you one of them girls that peels off the
[00:16.96]Bud light label just might run a pool table
[00:21.14]Roll your eyes if I call you an angel
[00:23.78]Ain't you one of them girls
[00:26.31]Ask you to dance you say
[00:28.42]No just to see how far I'll go
[00:31.15]Your song comes on and your eyes close
[00:33.72]That's when I know yeah
[00:36.04]You got your heart on lock down
[00:38.58]Got a wall I gotta knock down
[00:41.07]Kinda wanna do a shot now come on now
[00:44.22]And you're one of them girls
[00:46.09]That ain't tryna meet nobody
[00:48.87]You're just here for the party
[00:51.34]If I'm wrong then stop me yeah
[00:54.47]You're one of them girls
[00:56.03]That ain't handin' out your number
[00:58.84]You like to make us want you
[01:01.28]You like to make us wonder
[01:04.14]If you're one of them girls
[01:06.55]'Cause I'm one of them boys
[01:09.35]Would trade his whole world hm yeah
[01:14.46]For one of them girls who likes to act all quiet
[01:18.73]Sexy not even tryin'
[01:21.27]Yeah you know I ain't lyin' d**n right
[01:24.64]You one of them girls
[01:26.30]Broke every heart in your hometown
[01:29.13]On the day you rode out
[01:31.42]Got 'em all wishin' on stars now
[01:34.00]If I find one of them girls
[01:36.00]That ain't tryna meet nobody
[01:38.83]You're just here for the party
[01:41.34]If I'm wrong then stop me yeah
[01:44.55]You're one of them girls
[01:45.94]That ain't handin' out your number
[01:48.85]You like to make us want you
[01:51.32]You like to make us wonder
[01:54.18]If you're one of them girls
[01:56.68]Well I'm one of them boys
[01:59.17]Would trade his whole world hm yeah
[02:04.38]For one of them girls
[02:14.25]You're one of them girls
[02:16.79]I wanna put my lips on
[02:19.32]Hold all night long
[02:21.86]Write a little love song
[02:24.48]For one of them girls
[02:25.99]That ain't tryna meet nobody
[02:28.91]You're just here for the party
[02:31.50]If I'm wrong then stop me yeah
[02:34.38]You're one of them girls
[02:35.95]That ain't handin' out your number
[02:38.89]You like to make us want you
[02:41.27]You like to make us wonder
[02:44.13]If you're one of them girls
[02:46.67]Well I'm one of them boys
[02:49.31]Would trade his whole world his whole world
[02:54.14]For one of them girls
[02:59.09]Hmm one of them girls
data.trans:
[ti:One Of Them Girls]
[ar:Lee Brice]
[al:One Of Them Girls]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.14]//
[00:14.28]你是不是那种女孩 喜欢撕掉
[00:16.96]啤酒瓶的标签 还可能喜欢打台球
[00:21.14]如果我叫你天使 你会翻白眼
[00:23.78]你是不是那种女孩
[00:26.31]邀请你跳舞 你会拒绝
[00:28.42]只是想看看我能坚持多久
[00:31.15]属于你的歌响起来 你的双眼紧闭
[00:33.72]那时候我突然明白
[00:36.04]你已经把心锁起来
[00:38.58]筑起四面围墙 让我难以突破
[00:41.07]现在想要来一杯酒 快来吧
[00:44.22]你就是那种女孩
[00:46.09]不想认识任何人
[00:48.87]你只想一个人狂欢
[00:51.34]如果我说错了 那就让我别再说
[00:54.47]你就是那种女孩
[00:56.03]不愿让人知道你的电话号码
[00:58.84]你喜欢让我们欲求不得
[01:01.28]你喜欢让我们不断猜测
[01:04.14]如果你是那种女孩
[01:06.55]那我就是那种男孩
[01:09.35]愿意放弃他的全部
[01:14.46]只为得到一个喜欢安安静静的女孩
[01:18.73]无意之中表现出性感的姿态
[01:21.27]你知道我没有撒谎 真心实意
[01:24.64]你就是那种女孩
[01:26.30]让你家乡的每个人都心碎
[01:29.13]在你远走他乡的那一天
[01:31.42]他们每个人都对着星星许愿
[01:34.00]真希望遇到一个那样的女孩
[01:36.00]你不想认识任何人
[01:38.83]你只想一个人狂欢
[01:41.34]如果我说错了 那就让我别再说
[01:44.55]你就是那种女孩
[01:45.94]不愿让人知道你的电话号码
[01:48.85]你喜欢让我们欲求不得
[01:51.32]你喜欢让我们不断猜测
[01:54.18]如果你是那种女孩
[01:56.68]那我就是那种男孩
[01:59.17]愿意放弃他的全部
[02:04.38]只为得到那样的一个女孩
[02:14.25]你就是那种女孩
[02:16.79]我想要吻你
[02:19.32]整夜与你相拥
[02:21.86]写一首小情歌
[02:24.48]只为得到那样的一个女孩
[02:25.99]你不想认识任何人
[02:28.91]你只想一个人狂欢
[02:31.50]如果我说错了 那就让我别再说
[02:34.38]你就是那种女孩
[02:35.95]不愿让人知道你的电话号码
[02:38.89]你喜欢让我们欲求不得
[02:41.27]你喜欢让我们不断猜测
[02:44.13]如果你是那种女孩
[02:46.67]那我就是那种男孩
[02:49.31]愿意放弃全世界
[02:54.14]只为得到那样的一个女孩
[02:59.09]那样的女孩
